Containers.Name: Advanced Copy and Move
Containers.Description:
This plugin provides advanced cp and mv shell commnd alternatives named gcp and gmv that were created by applying the advcpmv-0.7-8.25.patch (from here: https://github.com/atdt/advcpmv) on the coreutils version used by unRAID.
But what does it do?
gcp and gmv are the normal cp and mv shell commands extended to support the parameters -g or --progress-bar, which will show the progress of the copy or move commands.
It will look like this while in progress: gcp -rg temp/ temp1
2 files copied so far... 3.0 GiB / 5.0 GiB [================================> ] 60.0 % Copying at 2.6 GiB/s (about 0h 0m 12s remaining) temp/file2.txt 1.0 GiB / 1.0 GiB [=============================================================> ] 99.9 %
And afterwards it will show a summary of the copy process:
5 files ( 5.0 GiB) copied in 44.5 seconds (115.2 MiB/s).
